sentences.en: Animals have an instinctive fear of fire.
He had a sort of instinctive chivalry in him.
sentences.cn: 在他身上有一种天生的骑士风度.

sentences.en: He tried to conceal his instinctive revulsion at the idea.
sentences.cn: 他试图饰盖自己对这一想法本能的厌恶.

sentences.en: I could not tell a reason, as if it was instinctive.
sentences.cn: 什么原因说不出来, 仿佛这是种本能似的.

sentences.en: Instinctive liking is the feeling which makes us take pleasure in another person's company.
sentences.cn: 本能的喜爱是一种感情,它能够使我们跟别人在一起的时候,感到愉快和高兴.

sentences.en: Ms Senatorova showed an instinctive feel for market economics.
sentences.cn: 谢纳托罗娃女士对市场经济学有一种天生的敏感。

sentences.en: Our instinctive reaction when someone causes us pain is to strike back.
sentences.cn: 当被别人弄疼时我们本能的反应是反击。

sentences.en: Overcoming every reluctance and instinctive decency, he had let himself consider sex.
sentences.cn: 尽管出于本性的正直, 他一万个不情愿这样想,但还是忍不住去考虑性的问题.

sentences.en: Pug's short assured answers were instinctive returns of the hard straight quizzing.
sentences.cn: 帕格用那几句简短而有把握的话不加思索地答复了对方单刀直入的追询.

sentences.en: Running away is our instinctive reaction when we meet danger.
sentences.cn: 遇到危险时,我们的本能反应就是跑开.

sentences.en: Set aside for a moment your instinctive dislike of the man.
sentences.cn: 暂且不要考虑你从直觉上憎恶他这一因素.

sentences.en: The process should be automatic, instinctive.
sentences.cn: 这种过程应该是自动的, 本能的.

sentences.en: The senses are the instruments of a newborn's instinctive knowledge.
sentences.cn: 感觉是新生儿的本能的知识的工具.

trans.tran_cn: 天生的，生来的，本能的，直觉的
trans.tran_en: based on instinct and not involving thought
